args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{"result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Exterior Trim Panel Can Detach While Driving

Tesla, Inc. (Tesla) is recalling certain 2024-2025 Cybertruck vehicles.  The cant rail, a stainless-steel exterior trim panel, can delaminate and detach from the vehicle.A detached panel can become a road hazard, increasing the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 46096.0
